metadata.title: CVE-2024-35965 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:Bluetooth: L2CAP: Fix not validating setsockopt user inputCheck user input length before copying data.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
